fr.enstb.xmlcode
Class InvalidXMLDataException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              fr.enstb.xmlcode.InvalidXMLDataException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InvalidXMLDataException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Exception thrown when trying to decode an object from invalid XML data regarding a given mapping or model file. The 'message' (see Throwable.getMessage()) contains the error description.

Author:
Sylvain Guerin
See Also:
XMLCoder, XMLDecoder, Serialized Form
